title: Video From Jaipur Shared as Condition of Delhi Bus During Monsoon
subtitle: Delhi Bus During Monsoon Fact Check | A video of a bus navigating through a flooded street as the water enters it, is being falsely claimed to be of Delhi. Delhi Congress vice president also shared the video taking a dig at Delhi CM Arvind Kejriwal.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A video of a bus navigating through a flooded street as the water enters it is being falsely claimed to be from Delhi. Delhi Congress vice president also shared the video taking a dig at Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal.

However, we found out that the video is from Jaipur, Rajasthan and not Delhi as claimed.
